# 1_26

Decrypt using the `ROT` cipher with a shift of `10`.

[CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=ROT13(true,true,false,10)&)

## Decrypted:

"To cipher or not to cipher, that is the question;
Whether 'tis nobler in the code to suffer
The slings and arrows of outrageous hacking,
Or to take arms against a sea of data breaches,
And by encrypting, end them?"
